Public Remarks: Investors Alert! Great Investment and Development opportunities. You are looking at a property in a prime location in New Westminster, Centrally located in uptown close to shopping center and transit. This property is a great Investment to hold or develop a Multi unit  home. OCP has approved  this block to change to RGO (Residential Ground Infill Housing)  What is RGO?  To allow a mix of ground oriented infill housing forms which are complementary to the existing neighbourhood character. Generally forms with a higher number of units are expected to be located on larger properties. Units can be attached, detached or a combination of the two. Duplexes, triplexes, quadraplexes, cluster houses, townhouses, rowhouses and other equivalent RGO forms.  Lot is approved for duplex by city.
